member.name: T:Face_Recognition.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer
member.summary: An object recognizer using PCA (Principle Components Analysis)

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.EigenImages
member.summary: Get the eigen vectors that form the eigen space
member.remarks: The set method is primary used for deserialization, do not attemps to set it unless you know what you are doing

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.Labels
member.summary: Get or set the labels for the corresponding training image

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.EigenDistanceThreshold
member.summary: Get or set the eigen distance threshold. The smaller the number, the more likely an examined image will be treated as unrecognized object. Set it to a huge number (e.g. 5000) and the recognizer will always treated the examined image as one of the known object.

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.AverageImage
member.remarks: The set method is primary used for deserialization, do not attemps to set it unless you know what you are doing

member.name: P:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.EigenValues
member.summary: Get the eigen values of each of the training image
member.remarks: The set method is primary used for deserialization, do not attemps to set it unless you know what you are doing

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.#ctor(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte}[],Emgu.CV.Structure.MCvTermCriteria@)
member.summary: Create an object recognizer using the specific tranning data and parameters, it will always return the most similar object
member.param: The images used for training, each of them should be the same size. It's recommended the images are histogram normalized

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.#ctor(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte}[],System.String[],Emgu.CV.Structure.MCvTermCriteria@)
member.summary: Create an object recognizer using the specific tranning data and parameters, it will always return the most similar object
member.param: The images used for training, each of them should be the same size. It's recommended the images are histogram normalized
The labels corresponding to the images

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.#ctor(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte}[],System.String[],System.Double,Emgu.CV.Structure.MCvTermCriteria@)
member.summary: Create an object recognizer using the specific tranning data and parameters
member.param: The images used for training, each of them should be the same size. It's recommended the images are histogram normalized
The labels corresponding to the images

The eigen distance threshold, (0, ~1000]. The smaller the number, the more likely an examined image will be treated as unrecognized object. If the threshold is < 0, the recognizer will always treated the examined image as one of the known object.

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.CalcEigenObjects(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte}[],Emgu.CV.Structure.MCvTermCriteria@,Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Single}[]@,Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Single}@)
member.summary: Caculate the eigen images for the specific traning image

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.EigenDecomposite(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte},Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Single}[],Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Single})
member.summary: Decompose the image as eigen values, using the specific eigen vectors
member.returns: Eigen values of the decomposed image

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.EigenProjection(System.Single[])
member.summary: Given the eigen value, reconstruct the projected image

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.GetEigenDistances(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte})
member.summary: Get the Euclidean eigen-distance between and every other image in the database
member.param: The image to be compared from the training images
member.returns: An array of eigen distance from every image in the training images

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.FindMostSimilarObject(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte},System.Int32@,System.Single@,System.String@)
member.summary: Given the to be examined, find in the database the most similar object, return the index and the eigen distance
member.param: The image to be searched from the database
The index of the most similar object
The eigen distance of the most similar object
The label of the specific image

member.name: M:Face_Recognition.Form1.EigenObjectRecognizer.Recognize(Emgu.CV.Image{Emgu.CV.Structure.Gray,System.Byte})
member.summary: Try to recognize the image and return its label
member.returns: String.Empty, if not recognized; Label of the corresponding image, otherwise
